page.title: 08MILLBROOK VILLAGE(CONT.)
page.content: Junior 2 24.In Junior 3 there are 22 children and 14 in Junior 4.Not all of the children live in Millbrook.Some live in Mossley .Some live in Carrbrook and a few in Micklehurst. There are three churches in the village a small Mathodist Chapel which is heavily protected against vandalism.St.James C.E. built in the 19th century of gritstone which has its winter services in the vicarage.St.Raphael R.C. was erected in the 1960's and resembles a mosque with its domed roof.The church has a thriving social club in a complex which includes church,school and presbytery.
